post.body: DOH! oh snap. LOL
Hot water on your windshield is so not a good idea. Ask me why, because I know. First hand.
With the door open it's finally cooling off a little in here, but I'm wearing a big ol turtleneck sweater so yeah, hot.
Well, I would suggest pimping yourself out for some coffee or suck it up. LOL
C'mon over, I have a hot office and hot coffee
I don't blame you.
The plumber will be going by the house to look at it. The date stamp on it said 1994 so I'm going to guess we need a new one.
LOL
To spite you and laugh behind your back. I have a house just like it. We should set them up.
You need a relaxing day at the spa. You're too stressed. Just let the words flowwwww...
...and toe freeze and nose freeze and ear freeze
I'm sorry. I wish I could help.
That is so sad but at least they get to keep the baby for the time being.
She's dirty minded too, she does pleasure parties, you'll get along fine.
You need to follow @ButchtasticKyle
cool
yes
Damn you, why do you do that to me. *sniffle*
Um no, where did you postit?
Saw no less than 6 wrecks on my way to work. What part of drive slow on the ice do people not get?
Be careful what you wish for. It's now a furnace in my office. The heat was set on 80. Good grief.
Replacing the water heater is just what I wanted to spend $ on 10 days before X-mas
Hot water heater went out. Fanfuckingtastic.
Going home to a sick girlfriend and leftovers. I'm thankful for the leftovers. Nothing else. Don't tell her that. I hate it when she's sick.
I kind of liked it better when I was anonymous. Oh well. Can't worry about that now I suppose. http://www.rageangel.blogspot.com
Feeling weird posting blog link, some followers are in my bucket & haven't neccesarily seen this side of me.
I'm out...million errands to run in the next hour then HOME FREE!!!!!
ACK! Busy busy, last day before vacation, hectic, help, send chocolate. Screw that, send vodka AND chocolate and a stripper! Yeah a stripper
Lunch was horrible, I'll never order from there again. I'm co-miserating about lousy employees with my boss. What a hoot!
That meeting sucked. A bunch of angry people who do not understand the concept of working for a non-profit in a recession. Hate this crap
New post http://rageangel.blogspot.com/
Staff Xmas lunch today.Free BBQ! I have to face the ones losing their jobs.The recession can suck it. I have to look these people in the eye
And the new furniture is coming this weekend! Yeah!
Good morning Tweeples!!! Last day before vacation!! Woohoo! All this means is that I have time off from the job that pays me.
I may be going to hell for twittering in church, but I'm taking everyone with me
At xmas play at sons christian school, this is my punishment for always saying god damnit
Not never, but next. Vacation is next week.
Out of the next 11 working days I will only work 4. Awesome!!!
I just realized that my vacation is never week and I should probably consider getting an assload of work done today and tomorrow.
I guess I need to get some work done. Blech.
